attributes.action: Stop the government paying for private hospital beds during the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: The money required to fund ,an already massively underfunded NHS, should not be diverted to private hospitals. The funds should be used to underpin the financial crisis the NHS finds itself in.
attributes.background: To ask the government to commandeer private beds instead of paying  2.4M of NHS funds to the private sector. We are at war with the virus and are now living in unprecedented times, the reduction of the death rate is the priority.
